item.title:
The film that influenced John Frankenheimer more than any other is 1966’s 'The Battle of Algiers.' “It’s one of the most perfect films I’ve ever watched.”

Here's everything else we learned from his 'Ronin' commentary: https://bit.ly/37h1tMe

item.title: To understand why the ending of 'Mad Men' is so dang perfect, there are a few things you need to know first. In honor of creator Matthew Weiner's birthday today,  @aurora_amidon unpacks the series' finale and the cultural significance behind it here: https://bit.ly/3h3Rjne

item.title: Few cinematographers have had as eclectic a career as 'Atonement' and 'Godzilla' DP Seamus McGarvey, who celebrates his birthday today. From 2018, here's our chat with him about his work executing the photogenic signatures of  'Bad Times at the El Royale': https://bit.ly/3hk17rR
